Title: Firmly support the Four Basic Principles, firmly support Reform and Opening Up
Publisher: Dongbei caijing daxue chubanshe (东北财经大学出版社)
Notes: The slogan in the right-hand corner reads "Warm congratulations on the convening of the National Model Workers and Advanced Workers Commendation Conference! Beijing 1989" (热烈祝贺全国劳动模范和先进工作者表彰大会召开! 北京 1989)
